pr_title: #1376: Scalar - Replace all the IsEqual with ScalarHashValue

timeline.message: Replace all the IsEqual with ScalarHashValue

timeline.bodyText: @marceloamadeu have you verified there is really no IsEqual incorrectly used in the tests of scalar package?
